comment: I have taken Dr. Khote for several classes. He is very caring and tries to make content meaningful to everyone. His feedback is usually good and straight forward.

This has been one of my worst experiences at KSU.  Dr. Khote gives vague assignments and feedback (if you even get feedback).  The class is unorganized and confusing.  One assignment we did this semester was copying and pasting terms from one chart to another.  In a 4000 level class.  Overall, I have learned very little in this class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Lots of homework

comment: I learned so much from him! He is so funny and engaging. He has real experiences that he brings to the classroom and it is very helpful honestly. The exams are a bit time consuming and a little tough, but all classes regardless of the professor, take the same exam. He helps you prepare for it though. Amazing!

Dr. Khote is a legend! Knowing his students were teaching during the day and were exhausted by night when it was time to complete course work, he held once weekly Zoom calls to discuss upcoming assignments and his expectations, later posting the recordings to D2L. His class only took me about 1.5 hours on Mondays when assignments were due!
Dr. Khote is so adorable and funny! Great professor! However, the midterm and final are brutal. Be prepared for them. The midterm is especially difficult and lengthy!

Dr. Khote was an amazing professor. He is kind, patience, and truly loves what he does. I was nervous about online classes this semester, due to Covid, but he seriously helped me get through it. He truly cares about his students and having everyone pass his class. He also wants everyone to take something away from their time in his class.

Professor Khote is very knowledgable about linguistics and does an amazing job at explaining lectures. There are weekly assignments that we often had time to work on in class. He is extremely helpful and cares about his students. I would take him again.

Professor Khote is so nice and caring. He has always answered my emails regarding anything and everything. I took him online due to COVID so many of our classes consisted of him lecturing and group discussion. He gives awesome feedback and truly cares about how we feel and tries to help us in any way that he can. I wish that I could take him again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Khote is a true master in his field of work! His knowledge of linguistics is astonishing and it shows through his lectures. It is a difficult class but he gives you everything you need to pass and is very accessible outside of class. Expect to work for your grade, but Dr. Khote's passion for teaching makes this course worth it!
learned a lot from this class!
